channel.title: Regiment-X 474 | Pvp & Econ Mix |
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://puu.sh/9laUB/55c2d428c2.png[/img] [b][URL=http://www.rx-rsps.tk/]HomePage[/URL][/b] | [URL=http://www.rx-rsps.tk/download/client.zip][B]Client Download[/B][/URL] | [B][URL=http://www.rx-rsps.tk/forums]Forums[/URL][/B]
Well this is just a project I've been working on but recently I thought of an old server I used to play which was a lot of fun but unfortunately I've forgotten the name of it but yeah just something I've decided to do while im bored will be decided whether or not it'll be hosted. The server base itself is a Project insanity based server and galkon's 474 look-alike modified a bit more the server will be worked on and updated on a daily basis.
[img]http://puu.sh/90e07.png[/img] [LEFT][B]Update list[/B] [CODE] [04/15/2014] - Downloaded the Server Client & Source [04/16/2014] - Clan chat added with everything working [04/16/2014] - Health and prayer Orbs have been added [04/16/2014] - Orbs can be toggled on or off [04/16/2014] - Home Area changed to Church - Varrock [04/21/2014] - Abyssal Whip special attack fixed (Animation & Gfx were corrupted) [04/21/2014] - Granite Maul special on entities has been fixed [04/21/2014] - Working on a quest base [04/21/2014] - Many Shops modified [04/23/2014] - Fixed up Emotes Tab [04/23/2014] - Switching is about 2 game ticks for 4 items [04/23/2014] - Tab to reply added [04/23/2014] - Bank all has been added (Button on lower right) [04/27/2014] - Clipped following has been added Server-Sided [05/25/2014] - Started working on the base again. [06/01/2014] - Dharok's formula reworked much more accurate [06/01/2014] - Started to redo a lot of skills [06/02/2014] - Fixed a bug with clan chat causing players to be kicked out every 4 minutes [06/02/2014] - Flax Picking has been added [06/02/2014] - Clipped following and clipped PVP(Mage/Range/Melee) [06/02/2014] - Bank Deposit boxes added [06/04/2014] - Cleaned up process a lot more [06/04/2014] - Much faster item switching [06/04/2014] - Bank Pin System has been implemented [06/05/2014] - Redone a lot of weapon special attacks [06/08/2014] - Fixed black Roofs [06/08/2014] - The client now uses High memory a lot more ground textures [06/08/2014] - You can now toggle the orbs on or off(::orbs) [06/08/2014] - Moving water added sorta a fun thing to have [06/08/2014] - Items kept on death formula updated much more accurate [06/10/2014] - Vote4Items have been added [/CODE][/LEFT] [B][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/B] [img]http://puu.sh/90e07.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/90e2k.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9kRkn/dd3e275c28.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9kRmT/9922982a40.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9p6Ju/b51da9cf50.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9kRpo/01eebd7d63.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9kRq7/5e85030022.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9l7Ow/09ad0b25ed.png[/img] [/CENTER]
